All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bishop
The Bishop class consists of all the movements and functionality for Bishop The Bishop can move diagonally in any direction as long as the path is clear
Board
The Board class creates a new board to be played on.
Checkmate
The Checkmate class contains methods to check if a Piece is under checkmate.
Checkmated
The Checkmated class contains information on the status of whether a piece is under checkmate
Chess
The Chess class contains the entry point for the chess program.
Input
The input class controls all user input (through the command line).
King
The King class consists of all the movements and functionality for King The King can move horizontally or vertically or diagonally one space in any direction The King can call castling where the King moves left or right two spaces from its string position and King moves to the opposite side of King
Knight
The Knight class consists of all the movements and functionality for Knight The Knight can only move 4 spaces in any direction and in an L shape consisting of 2 spaces vertically and one space horizontally OR 2 spaces horizontally and one space vertically
LastMove
The LastMove class holds the information of the last move conducted by either player
MovePiece
The MovePiece class contains methods that will check if a move is legal and execute instructions based on that
Pawn
The Pawn class consists of all the movements and functionality for Pawn The Pawn can move vertically as long as the path is clear From starting position Pawn can move two spaces and one space after that When capturing Pawn can only move diagonally to capture
pawnPromotion
This is called upon in Pawn class when pawn reaches other side of the board Pawn can then be promoted to become any other piece which changes its allowed movement to what the Pawn is promoted to
Piece
The Piece class contains the elements that make up a piece to be on the board
Queen
The Queen class consists of all the movements and functionality for Queen The Queen can move diagonally in any direction as long as the path is clear The Queen can move horizontally and vertically in any direction as long as the path is clear
Rook
The Rook class consists of all the movements and functionality for Rook The Rook can move horizontally or vertically in any direction as long as the path is clear
